title: We may be on the verge of a major breakthrough that will let us beam solar energy down to Earth
text:
We may be on the verge of a major breakthrough that will let us beam solar energy down to Earth 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
One of the humanity’s problems, whether we like to acknowledge it or not, is that we’re still heavily dependent on fossil fuel. Not only... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
